alert.note: Alert for Baxter; Eastern, Central, and Southern Searcy County Higher Elevations; Izard; Marion; Stone; Van Buren County Higher Elevations (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 04 at 2:47PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Stone, northwestern Independence, east central Searcy, Izard, eastern Marion, north central Van Buren, western Fulton and Baxter Counties through 330 PM CDT... At 247 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Price Place to Salesville to near Mountain View. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mountain Home... Mountain View... Bull Shoals... Melbourne... Gassville... Calico Rock... Lakeview in Baxter County... Oxford... Norfork... Cushman... Salesville... Mount Pleasant... Viola... Pineville... Briarcliff... Arkawana... Bexar... Ott... Lone Star... Herron... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Baxter; Eastern, Central, and Southern Searcy County Higher Elevations; Izard; Marion; Stone; Van Buren County Higher Elevations
